DOC.brief_summary: Researchers Towson University conduct study computer password behavior among user difficulty use hand arm ( e.g. , individual carpal tunnel syndrome , high level spinal cord injury , etc. ) . Volunteers need take short 5-10 minute online survey . The survey completely confidential anonymous . If would like participate , please visit URL . Thank . http : //pages.towson.edu/jdarcy/securitysurvey.htm
DOC.detailed_description: Two researcher Department Computer & Information Sciences Towson University seek individual difficulty use hand arm ( e.g. , result carpal tunnel syndrome , high level spinal cord injury , etc . ) participate survey . The survey take approximately 10 minute complete response remain completely confidential anonymous . The purpose survey gain insight compute behavior individual upper-body motor impairment . We expect result help researcher system developer create effective access control techniques meet special need user population . The result also assist employer provide improved technical procedural support computer user difficulty use standard input device . If would like take online survey , please go follow link : http : //www.towson.edu/cosc/securitysurvey If prefer paper version survey , please send u e-mail contains mail address send survey . Contact information : John D'Arcy , Ph.D. ( jdarcy @ towson.edu ) Jinjuan Feng , Ph.D. ( jfeng @ towson.edu ) Department Computer & Information Sciences Towson University 7800 York Road Towson , MD 21252 U.S.A .
